blog.name: phandomgives
blog.title: Phandom Gives
blog.description: Group of Dan and Phil fans inspired to do more good in the world. DONATE NOW!  bit.ly/PG-Dan28 Please, contact via @PhandomGives on Twitter phandomgives.com

summary: Join us for twenty eight hours of a mix of vintage Dan videos, Dan and Phil content, phandom conversation, and some exciting and...
body:
Join us for twenty eight hours of a mix of vintage Dan videos, Dan and Phil content, phandom conversation, and some exciting and exclusive giveaways as we try and raise money for YoungMinds for Dan’s 28th birthday!! 

Giveaways include merch from the Daniel Howell shop and commissions from fandom creators! You must be present in the chat to win.

The livestream will take place on June 8th at 7 pm UTC here: rabb.it/s/apywug

Click here to learn how to sign up to rabb.it. 

Don’t forget to keep donating and sharing Dan’s birthday drive! bit.ly/PG-Dan28 💛

blog.name: thatladdydnp
blog.title: and thats the tea, sis
blog.description: Call me T ‘cause all I do is spill it

summary: you know what i keep thinking about? Dan doing soft, gentle videos.  Piano covers, mental health informative videos, music...
body:
you know what i keep thinking about?
Dan doing soft, gentle videos.
Piano covers, mental health informative videos, music collabs with other artists like Dodie, Orla, Tessa, Conan.
he’s grown so much as a person and a creator, I don’t know what will he do differently with his channel, but I’m so ready for it.

I guess bye bye sleep for June then
